description:
This table presents data for developing countries based on data from DHS conducted since 1990.
       Quintiles are defined by socioeconomic status in terms of assets or wealth, rather than in terms of income or consumption.
       For details, see Macro International. 2007b

fields.description: year of survey for every country.
fields.name: survey_year
fields.title: Survey_year

fields.description: Human Development Index Category derived from the HDI Rank.
fields.name: hdi_category
fields.title: HDI Category

fields.description: Indicator described in the data series.
fields.name: indicator_name
fields.title: Indicator Name

fields.description: Value for the Year and Indicator Name.
fields.name: values
fields.title: Values

name: child_and_demography
title: Inequalities in maternal and child health
